greeting.subtitle: Experienced Software Developer Analyst with Full-Stack expertise, actively involved in all phases of the Software Development Life Cycle. Passionate about leveraging my knowledge and skills to support and collaborate with colleagues to achieve shared objectives. Demonstrated success in delivering impactful projects that drive growth for clients and organizations. Specialized in implementing innovative Mobile and Web Solutions.
greeting.title: Hi, Jean Carlos on this side

skillsSection.skill1: Develop highly functional Back end structures and interactives Front end / User Interfaces for your web and mobile applications.
skillsSection.skill2: Integration of third party services such as Firebase, Azure, RabbitMQ.
skillsSection.skill4: Continous Integration and Continous Deployment control with Azure Devops.
skillsSection.skillssubtitle: Conceptualize and develop projects with the most popular and functional stacks. As the following:

APAP.desc: Developing solutions, based on the requirements of the institution to create services that meet the needs of customers.

LogicOne.desc: Developing WEB systems based on Microsoft technology and hybrid mobile applications, such as:

Endurance.desc: Providing my services in Software Development and solving issues that can affect the user experience of the customers that use the provided services by the Endurance/Newfold Digital company and it's integrations, primarily EcomDash (Web application where you can manage both your marketplace and ecommerce website sales).

Encamina.desc: My responsibilities are mostly to develop new features on a Web Application called DORA PQ from TIBA, it’s intended to manage logistics needs related to finding freight forwarders, logistics operators, and customs agents in Spain, specifically specializing in international transport.

Teric.desc:
Providing my services as a Back End Developer for building a Fitness App called BiaFit, which is defined as your personalized fitness companion, empowering you to create and adapt training programs perfectly suited to your experience levels and unique fitness aspirations.
Making use of many technologies, such as:

Banreservas.desc: As a Back End Development Engineer at Banco de Reservas, I am responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining the backend systems that power our banking solutions. My role involves working with technologies such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Azure services to ensure seamless integration and efficient functionality of our applications.

Stamp.desc: As a Backend Engineer at Stamp, I am responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining the backend systems that support our innovative solutions. My role involves working with .NET and Azure technologies to ensure the seamless integration and functionality of our applications.

PSLearning.projectDesc: Mobile and Web applications addressed to the citizen service officers of Punto Solidario. This application allows access to a dynamic and fully self-managed learning mode to improve the skills of Punto Solidario staff.

startupProjects.title: Projects
startupProjects.subTitle: SOME PERSONAL AND COMPANIES PROJECTS THAT I HAVE PARTICIPATED ON ITS CREATION OR SUPPORTING THEM

Movilapap.projectDesc: The Móvilapap application is a cutting-edge mobile application designed to cater to the unique needs of banking clients. This app serves as a gateway for customers to seamlessly access a variety of financial products and exclusive benefits tied to their banking relationships.

DORA.projectDesc: The DORA PQ Web Application by TIBA is a specialized system for managing international transportation and logistical needs in Spain.

Biafit.projectDesc: BiaFit, is your personalized fitness companion, empowering you to create and adapt training programs perfectly suited to your experience levels and unique fitness aspirations. Whether you're aiming for strength, muscle building, or overall fitness enhancement, BiaFit's subscription-based workout platform provides you with a versatile toolkit to design and customize training routines according to your needs.

Banreservas.projectDesc: The Banreservas Personas App, free of data and internet usage, allows you to make inquiries, transactions, locate ATMs, branches, and sub-agents, and stay up to date with the latest news from Banreservas in the most convenient and simple way.

Stamp.projectDesc:
Save 100% of VAT upfront while shopping tax-free. Forget about refund fees, lines, and paperwork.

Traditional tax refund agencies charge you up to 60% per transaction. The more you spend, the more agencies take from you.
